title: 5th Time Is A Charm
itunes:title: 5th Time Is A Charm
description:
Dear Shirley. I listen to your show all the time and I laugh at some of the letters I hear. However looking at my own life I realize that I need to write a letter my damn self. I'm a married man of six years. I love my wife. I have since we both said I love you for the first time I made a promise to her and myself that I would never betray her. Well I did anyway several times...

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Shirley. I listen to your show all the time and I laugh at some of the letters I hear. However looking at my own life I realize that I need to write a letter my damn self. I'm a married man of six years. I love my wife. I have since we both said I love you for the first time I made a promise to her and myself that I would never betray her. Well I did anyway several times...
